page.title: 13BURTON NEWS CONTINUED
page.content:
{ FRIENDS OF BURTON SCHOOL The F.O.B.S. held a Summer Fair on Saturday the 29th. June. The highlight was a {gas balloon race,}with a prize of a season ticket to Manor House Leisure Park.There was a{"Silly {Sports"}which attracted a lot of children. At the end of the day F.O.B.S. had raised{Â£340.00. { { BURTON JUBILEE HALL MEETING} A meeting was held to elect a new committee to manage the Village Hall.
{ BURTON CRICKET CLUB} Burton Cricket Club has had a fairly successful season. An attempt has been made to form a{Ladies Cricket Club}but the first match was cancelled because of rain.
